refnamediv.refpurpose: Cyberware Echo file format to BRL-CAD converter

refsect1.title: DESCRIPTION
refsect1.para: cy-g converts the specified input_cy_file to a BRL-CAD database.g file. The input data must be Cyberware digitizer data in the Cyberware Echo (.cy) file format. Support is limited to scans in cylindrical scan format. The result of the conversion is a single ARS (Arbitrary faceted solid) solid.

refsect1.title: DIAGNOSTICS
refsect1.para: Error messages are intended to be self-explanatory.

refsect1.title: COPYRIGHT
refsect1.para: This software is Copyright (c) 1998-2014 by the United States Government as represented by U.S. Army Research Laboratory.

refsect1.title: BUG REPORTS
refsect1.para: Reports of bugs or problems should be submitted via electronic mail to <devs@brlcad.org>.
